name: Assassin (itch) (kerz)
description:
ASSASSIN

Arrow keys or W A S D for movement. X to dash.

Sneaking trou the outer regions of the kingdom as you make your way to the centre to kill the king. sneak by the valiant guards who protect our realm without killing any.

This is part one of the game, all the actual king killing will be released separately in part 2.
